recipesJson.name: Rin's Cinnamon Pear Cronut
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description: WF apple-cin strudel adds pastry and cinnamon notes as well as light apple note which pairs well with pear. Croissant adds that note. Glazed donut at a low percentage adds mainly glaze (which goes with the LA cream cheese icing for the filling) and a light donut note. LA Cream cheese icing gives a cream cheese note. Marshmallow vanilla adds nice vanilla note and body.
